index.name: louisville
index.subtitle: University of Louisville
index.about: Digital Initiatives coordinates the digitization, digital presentation, and digital preservation of archival collections and other library resources at the University of Louisville Libraries.
index.description: Metadata guidelines created for the Digital Initiatives of the University of Louisville Libraries.

mappings.title: CONTENTdm Cookbook: Recipes for metadata entry for UofL Digital Initiatives
mappings.description: This document is intended as a guide to data entry and descriptive cataloging for University of Louisville digital projects using CONTENTdm software.
